## blockRendering.InputConnection class

The base class to represent an input that takes up space on a block during rendering

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class InputConnection extends Connection 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Connection](./blockly.connection.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `InputConnection` class.
